pma:database.name: Cementerio
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `difunto` ( `id_difunto` int(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nombre` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `apellido1` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `apellido2` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `fecha_nacimiento` date DEFAULT NULL, `fecha_defuncion` date DEFAULT NULL, `fecha_enterramiento` date DEFAULT NULL, `id_sepultura` int(4) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_difunto`), UNIQUE KEY `id_difunto` (`id_difunto`), UNIQUE KEY `id_sepultura` (`id_sepultura`), CONSTRAINT `difunto_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_sepultura`) REFERENCES `sepultura` (`id_sepultura`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `responsable` ( `id_responsable` int(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nombre` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `apellido1` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `apellido2` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `cuenta_domiciliacion` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_responsable`), UNIQUE KEY `id_responsable` (`id_responsable`), UNIQUE KEY `id_responsable_2` (`id_responsable`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `sepultura` ( `id_sepultura` int(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `codigo_contable` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `calle` varchar(2) NOT NULL, `num_sepultura` int(4) NOT NULL, `nombre_titular` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `apellido1_titular` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `apellido2_titular` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `tipo_contrato` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `observaciones` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `id_responsable` int(4) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_sepultura`), UNIQUE KEY `id_sepultura` (`id_sepultura`), UNIQUE KEY `id_responsable` (`id_responsable`), CONSTRAINT `sepultura_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_responsable`) REFERENCES `responsable` (`id_responsable`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
